cast.name: 亚历山德拉·希门内斯 Alexandra Jiménez

introduction: According to the synopsis, César and Teresa (played by Silva and Jiménez) are a perfectly happy couple, but one night, she sleeps with Coque Malla, who has been her boyfriend’s great idol since his teenage years. The woman, feeling regretful, confesses to her boyfriend, but he doesn’t know how to react. Because… Is being unfaithful with your erotic fantasy excusable? But the thing is, Teresa has slept with César’s, and there is no standard rulebook for this. That’s why the fan has to talk to the musician. And so, they travel to Miami in search of him, while simultaneously reconsidering their 15-year relationship and, while they’re at it, their own lives.
